Name: Hentai Waifu Vol.1
About the game: Hentai Waifu is a Casual Ecchi / Hentai Clicker Game Puzzle. The goal is to destroy the blocks in the necessary time to go through the levels. Repeat levels to get coins and unblock more levels. Unique game diferent from the others of genre. Game features -Artworks >NO CENSURE -Can Undress -Achievements -Handsfree mode -Music to Relax We release our patreon page, if you want get early acess, acess to artwork and/or just support us to make your life and our games better, please, support us :D
